attributes.action: Compulsory mediation before any county court action
attributes.additional_details:
Introduce mediation between both parties before any claim appears at the small claims court.
Bailiffs are continually taking the hard worked possessions of decent normal people in their homes just because one side says they owe money. The well of in society who own multiple homes and assets are pillaging the working class on a daily basis , its not fair its immoral and its pure greed . How can the working class ever afford to buy a home if the wealthy are taking all their money.
